article.title: Cricket_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: WiktionarycricketCricketis a bat-and-ball sport contested by two teams.

preblock.preline: *Cricket (insect), family Gryllidae, also known as "true crickets"

list.listitem: Tettigoniidae, known as katydids or bush-crickets
